PaperFaces Project

Gallery of portraits drawn with Paper by Fiftythree.

PaperFaces was an illustration project by designer Michael Rose — hey that’s me! Each day I’d draw the face of a stranger using an iPad, a stylus, and the fabulous sketching app Paper by 53.

If you scroll down far enough you can see how my technique evolved from creepy faceless faces to something more realistic and true to life.

  paperfaces, paper by 53, portrait, drawing, painting, ipad, illustration, 365 project   Updated August 29, 2014
